this O
Vietnamese O
phone O

price. O

just O
found O
out O
now O
about O
this O
one O
thing O
that O
is O
too O
disappointing.In O
the O
advertisement, O
it O
says O
that O
the O
rear O
camera O
(back O
camera) O
has O
48MP. O
When O
I O
checked O
the O
camera O
settings, O
it's O
only O
12MP. O
So O
fake. O
12MP O
is O
too O
far O
from O
48MP. O
